overview.en: Terra Virtua Kolect (TVK) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Terra Virtua Kolect has a current supply of 1,200,000,000 with 219,201,959 in circulation. The last known price of Terra Virtua Kolect is 0.74077994 USD and is down -3.46 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 10 active market(s) with $35,659,833.05 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://terravirtua.io/.
